Short-Term Packing ChecklistÂ¶

The following is a checklist of what Jeremy should pack for short-term travel

Definition

Short-term travel is traveling lasting 2-5 days.

The following is a list of supplies for a trip lasting \(d\) days.

  • Clothes

    1. \(d\) T-shirts

    2. \(d-1\) boxers

    3. \(d\) socks

    4. 1-2 collared shirts

    5. 1-2 pants/shorts

    6. Jacket

  • Dob-Kit

    1. Toothbrush

    2. Toothpaste

    3. Razor

    4. Shaving Cream

    5. Meds

      • NSAID

      • Rx Meds

    6. Comb

    7. Deodorant

  • Electronics

    1. Tablet

    2. Laptop

    3. Chargers

      • Computer Charger

      • Charging Hub

      • Lightning-USB cable

      • USB-USBC cable

    4. Tablet

  • Pockets

    1. Wallet/Passport

    2. Phone

  • Miscellaneous

    1. MFR ball

    2. Resistance band

    3. Book

    4. Water bottle

Note

Many of these do not need to be packed, but can be worn.

Note

Many of the clothes may be handwashed and dried overnight
